chapter.title: Installation
chapter.para:
2017-05-31 - shermann: @taroth: Since there is no need for installation/configuration issues as described in the original cmm sources, the appendices describing the standard and additional metrics have also been removed. Nevertheless, we think that it is necessary for an OpenStack operator to have basic info on the metrics he/she can use for monitoring the OS environment. Will you include the info in the Deployment Guide? Or at least a link to the Monasca Agent doc where the plugins are described?
SUSE OpenStack Cloud Monitoring is automatically installed and configured if you deploy the Monasca barclamp. For details, see the SUSE OpenStack Cloud Deployment Guide, chapter Deploying the OpenStack Services, section Deploying Monasca. It is available from .
